favourite.article: Lord, I never would change. Cause I am made to be filled with You.
Praise the Lord, I'm glad I'm a vessel to be filled with the Lord.
We are made to be filled with the Lord!
Yes! I just made to be filled with the Lord!
Yes, I’m made to be filled with the Lord.
Beautiful hymn with a wonderful composition and it flourishes in my heart. Soli Deo Gloria
Yes LORD regardless what happens I'd never change...coz I was made to be filled by YOU!!! I love You soo much.
Amen, Amen, Amen!
OH LORD AMEN HALLELUJAH. Yes, I'm made to be filled with the Lord. Yes, we're made to filled with Him.
Beautifullllllllllllllllllllllllllll
Hallelujah! there's nothing compare to my destiny to be thoroughly filled with the Lord! Yes! I'm made to be filled with the Lord!
Praise the Lord. Jesus Christ, my only ultimate goal.
I feel the hearbeat of this hymn as it touches every strings of melodious symphony within my longing before the Lord...to trust Him without doubting despite trials and pains....
What matters is that more of Him I would gain.
Praise the Lord. I'm just made to be filled with the Lord. What a glorious victory Christ is in us.

This song reminds my consecration before the Lord, that's why every time I hear this song I am revived that whatever will happen in my life: ups or down, good or bad things, positive or negative things... I'm made to be filled with the Lord. Yes, I'm made to be filled with the Lord.
I love this song. Oh Lord Jesus, I love You! :)

Praise the Lord! :) This is one of my childhood favorite song. I had been singing this song as part of the children's meeting and yes at that time I could not fully understand what the lyrics really mean, but when I sang this in my YP days, it has touched my heart and as I sang the song this morning, YES I AM MADE TO BE FILLED WITH THE LORD AND THAT THE WORLD CANNOT PROMISE ME MORE THAN WHAT THE LORD AND HIS KINGDOM DOES TO ME! :)

What a sweet hymn to sing, especially for our younger generation. I remember singing this song in the children's meetings but it didn't mean much to me then. Now when I sing this hymn I realize that it is such an honor and a privilege to give our lives to the Lord. Life is not worth living a day for things that will soon pass away because we are made to be filled with the Lord! May we all follow the Lamb wherever He may go.
Praise the Lord! I am just made to be filled with Him. There's nothing compare to my destiny to be filled only with the Lord. Hallelujah!
Saints, we are made to be filled with the LORD!

I thank the Lord, once again I am refreshed with this song, my favorite song when I was in college with the help of one family who deeply love the Lord Jesus. Since then my life would become meaningful. Yes, Amen! Though the path may be holding much joy or much pain, what matters is that more of Him I would gain, regardless of what happens, I never would change. 'Cause I'm made to be filled with the Lord. Hallelujah!There's nothing that compares to my destiny. Praise the Lord He is my future and my destiny. I love You Jesus more and more each day!!!

I love this hymn so much because when I heard this hymn it reminds me about my hope and my destiny. 'Nor its life worth living a day and the things that will soon pass away. It doesn't matter how rich or successful I'll be or how many things be offered to me, there's nothing compared to my destiny. Sometimes when we are tempted by the strategy of Satan in this world, especially if the world offered us everything we feel that we are very far from the Lord. Just remember saints of what Moses said, that all things will be gone and we will soon fly away. That's why our hope and destiny is the Lord Jesus Christ. Amen.
"Though the path may be holding Much joy or much pain, What matters is that more of Him I would gain,.." Praise the Lord! I'm just made to be filled with the Lord! Hallelujah!
PRAISE THE LORD! SAINTS! WE ARE NOT FOR THE WORLD BUT WE ARE FOR THE LORD. LET US LIVE AND WALK IN HIM, BY HIM, AND THROUGH HIM. AMEN!
Everything is really vanity without the Lord! The world may be pleasing in our natural man but we are not made for it. We are just made to be FILLED WITH THE LORD!
Praise the Lord!!!!! We should follow Christ absolutely! We as believers are made to be filled with the Lord. We are not for the world! We are for the Lord's recovery! Amen! Amen! Amen!
AMEN! I love this song so much. It always reminds me that Christ is our real satisfaction. Christ is our all in all!!! 0h, yes! I was made to be filled with the Lord.
"Dear young saints, everything under the sun is vanity, the only real thing is just "CHRIST AND THE CHURCH". So how we need to consecrate ourselves to love CHRIST and His Body the CHURCH. AMEN!
It brings me a full realization that in this world nothing good exist. Our living and our habitation is only CHRIST and His recovery. Amen. Praise the Lord!

I love this song so much. It reminds me that the Lord is really our satisfaction. Though there are many promises from the world, we're really just made for the Lord to build up His dwelling place. Amen. Praise the Lord!!!

Doesn't matter how rich or successful I'd be, Or how many pleasures be offered to me. There's nothing that compares to my destiny— To be thoroughly filled with the Lord. Praise the Lord. Amen, Amen, Amen.
"Dear Lord Jesus, remind us of this purpose of our human life when we go through the trials and fiery tests, that everything is just so that we would contain You and be filled with You."
Praise the Lord! We must be filled with the Lord every day. Amen. Amen. Amen.
